infoText: Do you want to optimize Eclipse?
Check out the latest info on SpringFramework
Do you know about the new quick search feature?

linkText: Renaming a Grails domain class or controller action will be aware of Grails naming conventions.

infoText: Are your Grails commands timing out?
linkText: Bump up the command time out on the Grails Launch preferences page

infoText: Do you have Groovy scripts that are not compiled until runtime?
linkText: Configure this at the Groovy Compiler preferences page
